Posts.Content: happytobehere1 wrote: Hi Ladies I was just to my PS and a dermologist, because I have this rash that looks like dermitits on both of my breasts.  I had a BL mast done on March 26th and feeling super.  I can't believe how good I feel.  My derm told me to put oxistat on my breast 2 times a day but it doesn't seem to be helping.  I don't have an infection because I don't have a fever.  I am getting my fills on a regular basis and only have 1 more to go with exchange to gummies sometime in July.  I was just wondering if anyone else had this condition and if so, any advice as to what to put on? I was using bio oil for the scars and PS said to stop using that and use cocoa butter, but not derm said not to use that either.   So confused. Any advice would be helpful.  thanks   God Bless all............ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast Rash happytobehere1 happytobehere1
